DOC.brief_summary: This is a non-inferiority randomized study to compare a plastic stent without central lumen (VIADUCT) with self-expandable metal stents for treatment of malignant obstruction of the common bile duct. It is a non-interventional study, a CE mark for the VIADUCT stent exists.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of a Plastic Stent Without Central Lumen With Self Expandable Metal Stents in Patients With Malignant Distal Biliary Obstruction
DOC.criteria: histologically proven malignant biliary stenosis signs of biliary obstruction informed consent age under 18 Operations like RouxY, biliodigestive Anastomosis, BII life expectancy less than 3 months Karnfosky index less than 60%
